summary: The magician Prospero attempts to stop his daughter's affair with an enemy.
cast: John Gielgud|Michael Clark|Michel Blanc|Erland Josephson|Isabelle Pasco|Tom Bell|Kenneth Cranham|Mark Rylance|Gerard Thoolen|Pierre Bokma|Jim van der Woude|Michiel Romeyn|Orpheo|Paul Russell|James Thierrée|Emil Wolk|Marie Angel|Ute Lemper|Deborah Conway
title: Los libros de Próspero
